images.Name: Warren Worthington III
images.Power: Feathered wings granting flight; enhanced vision; later forms include regenerative healing and metal wings as Archangel.

images.Name: Sean Cassidy
images.Power: Produces powerful sonic screams capable of flight, concussive force, and sound manipulation.

images.Name: Piotr 'Peter' Nikolayevich Rasputin
images.Power: Can transform his body into organic steel, granting superhuman strength, durability, and endurance.

images.Name: Alex Summers
images.Power: Absorbs cosmic energy and projects it as powerful plasma blasts from his body.

images.Name: Bobby Drake
images.Power: Manipulates moisture to create and control ice; can transform his body into organic ice form.

images.Name: Erik Lehnsherr (Max Eisenhardt)
images.Power: Master of magnetism; can manipulate magnetic fields, control metal, and generate force fields.

images.Name: Kurt Wagner
images.Power: Teleportation, wall-crawling, superhuman agility, and shadow-blending; prehensile tail and night vision.

images.Name: Ororo Munroe
images.Power: Controls the weather; can summon storms, manipulate wind, lightning, and temperature.

images.Name: Logan (James Howlett)
images.Power: Accelerated healing factor, enhanced senses and strength, retractable adamantium claws.

images.Name: En Sabah Nur (Apocalypse)
images.Power: Immortality, molecular control, super strength, shapeshifting, and access to advanced Celestial technology.

images.Name: Shiro Yoshida
images.Power: Generates superheated plasma, enabling flight and powerful fire-based attacks.

images.Name: Pietro Maximoff (Quicksilver)
images.Power: Superhuman speed, reflexes, and accelerated perception.

images.Name: Scott Summers
images.Power: Projects powerful concussive optic blasts from his eyes, controlled with ruby quartz lenses.
